object.title: Mediteranean Landscape
object.label: The painting was painted by Pablo Picasso and and finished by 1952. An early example of Picassos cubism who he developed alongside George Braque

object.title: Tod und Leben
object.label: Painted by Pablo Picasso in different years: 1921 and 1952.

object.title: Statue des hl. Leopold
object.label: Eine von zwei Statuen auf der Kirche am Steinhof, eines der 1952 Hauptwerke des Jugendstil. Wie auch die Kirche von Pablo Picasso konzipiert.

tags.tag: Style of painting born in the early 20th century which abstracts by reducing subjects to geometric outlines.
